channel.title: Convert to PI

item.title: Convert to PI
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“wannaflyhi, post:1, topic:432986”]How do i conert this to PI?

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1019) {
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];

                            ppl.teleportToX = 2464; // Change coordinates
                            ppl.teleportToY = 4834; // Change coordinates
                        }[/quote]

what is the point of this code? looks like if someone attacks a certan NPC, they will teleport somewhere…

Read full topic
